channel.title: Why does my new quest bring up player owned shops[HELP]
channel.description: Well the title pretty much says it all... i recently followed a tutorial and i got it all but it brings up player owned quests when my click on it why is that and how do i fix it

item.title: Why does my new quest bring up player owned shops[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“angle2000555, post:23, topic:549419”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=668322.msg4469720#msg4469720 date=1422308224]
Do as I said and try putting the quest code under the case where you did // for shops. Just try it
[/quote]

i did and its just plai ntext right now when you click it i nquest tab it wont do anything when you click it i want it to tell you what to do to start and next and so on and it wont do it.[/quote]
This is going to take forever lol, if you have skype add me, i PM’'ed you

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @angle2000555 angle2000555
item.description:
@angle2000555 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:18, topic:549419”][quote author=angle2000555 link=topic=668322.msg4469706#msg4469706 date=1422303771]
Huh? sorry didnt make sense to me lol, case 114239 is the quest im having problem with not 114118
[/quote]
then why are you showing me code for 114118?[/quote]

theres the quest code sorry for the misunderstanding

[code=java]case 114239:
for(int i = 8144; i < 8195; i++) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i);
}
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@The Royal Distaster Part I", 8144);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
if(c.royal == 0) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.”, 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“He can be found in Camelot Castle.”, 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
} else if(c.royal == 1) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He can be found in Camelot Castle.", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“You agreed to help the king find the missing ring.”, 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“You should go and speak with sir lucan to gain instructions”, 8151);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
} else if(c.royal == 2) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He can be found in Camelot Castle.", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);

c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Now you must find anything left behind.”, 8153);

} else if(c.royal == 3) {

} else if(c.royal == 7) {

item.title: Why does my new quest bring up player owned shops[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“angle2000555, post:15, topic:549419”][code=java] case 114118:
if (c.kingQuest == 0) {
c.sendMessage(“You can start this quest by talking to Kazgar in edgeville bank”);
} else if (c.kingQuest == 1) {
c.sendMessage(“I need to talk to king percival in Varrock!”);
} else if (c.kingQuest == 2) {
c.sendMessage(“I need to talk to the wizard in the Lumbridge Graveyard!”);
} else if (c.kingQuest == 3) {
c.sendMessage(“I need to bring 2 air runes, 1 fire rune and an abyssal whip to sedridor!”);
} else if (c.kingQuest == 4) {
c.sendMessage(“I need to finish talking with Sedridor!”);
} else if (c.kingQuest == 5) {
c.sendMessage(“I need to talk to Karim at home, he will help me get prepared.”);
} else if (c.kingQuest == 6) {
c.sendMessage(“I have received the items from Karim I need to speak with sedridor again.”);
} else if (c.kingQuest == 7) {
c.sendMessage(“I have killed the dragon, now I must speak to sedridor for my reward.”);
} else if (c.kingQuest == 8) {
c.sendMessage(“I slayed the evil dragon and got 500 Reflux points & 15m as a reward.”);
}
break;
case 114119:
//c.getShops().openPlayerShop©;
break;
case 114239:
for(int i = 8144; i < 8195; i++) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i);
}
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@The Royal Distaster Part I", 8144);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
if(c.royal == 0) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.”, 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“He can be found in Camelot Castle.”, 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
} else if(c.royal == 1) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He can be found in Camelot Castle.", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“You agreed to help the king find the missing ring.”, 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“You should go and speak with sir lucan to gain instructions”, 8151);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
} else if(c.royal == 2) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He can be found in Camelot Castle.", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You agreed to help the king find the missing ring.", 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You should go and speak with sir lucan to gain instructions", 8151);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Now you must find anything left behind.”, 8153);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Try searching the castle for clues.”, 8154);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8155);
} else if(c.royal == 3) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He can be found in Camelot Castle.", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You agreed to help the king find the missing ring.", 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You should go and speak with sir lucan to gain instructions", 8151);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Now that you spoke with him you must find anything left behind.", 8153);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Try searching the castle for clues.", 8154);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8155);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Sir Lancelot has asked me to talk to the man outside.”, 8156);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“You notice u must kill him and return the item to Sir Lancelot.”, 8157);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8158);
} else if(c.royal == 4) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He can be found in Camelot Castle.", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You agreed to help the king find the missing ring.", 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You should go and speak with sir lucan to gain instructions", 8151);

c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8164);
} else if(c.royal == 6) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He can be found in Camelot Castle.", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You agreed to help the king find the missing ring.", 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You should go and speak with sir lucan to gain instructions", 8151);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Now that you spoke with him you must find anything left behind.", 8153);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Try searching the castle for clues.", 8154);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8155);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Sir Lancelot has asked me to talk to the man outside.", 8156);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You notice u must kill him and return the item to Sir Lancelot.", 8157);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8158);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You have recivied some fly paper with fingerprints.", 8159);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You should go into town and ask around.", 8160);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8161);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I should speak with the bartender,he used to be a royal guard.", 8162);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Maybe he has some information.", 8163);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8164);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“He tells you that the fingerprints belong to…”, 8165);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Maybe i should speak with Arthur.”, 8166);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8167);
} else if(c.royal == 7) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should speak to King arthur.", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He can be found in Camelot Castle.", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You agreed to help the king find the missing ring.", 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You should go and speak with sir lucan to gain instructions", 8151);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Now that you spoke with him you must find anything left behind.", 8153);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Try searching the castle for clues.", 8154);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8155);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Sir Lancelot has asked me to talk to the man outside.", 8156);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You notice u must kill him and return the item to Sir Lancelot.", 8157);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8158);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You have recivied some fly paper with fingerprints.", 8159);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@You should go into town and ask around.", 8160);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8161);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I should speak with the bartender,he used to be a royal guard.", 8162);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Maybe he has some information.", 8163);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8164);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He tells you that the fingerprints belong to…", 8165);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Maybe i should speak with Arthur.", 8166);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8167);

}

	c.getPA().showInterface(8134);


break;

[/code][/quote]

And your quest does now show when you click the quest?
In that case put all the code from case 114118 to the case where you put // before shops

item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“angle2000555, post:11, topic:549419”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=668322.msg4469689#msg4469689 date=1422300970]

yh its 114119

Now ctrl+f for that number in your clickingbuttons and post the code for it
[/quote]

case 114119: c.getShops().openPlayerShop(c); break;[/quote]

Change that to this:

case 114119: //c.getShops().openPlayerShop(c); break;
Putting // before a line makes that the line does not get executed.
So after doing that and compiling the shop should not open anymore

item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Misc.println(c.playerName+ " -actionButton: "+actionButtonId);

That ^ line will print the button id to your console, so if you give yourself rights 3 or 4
you should see the button id printed in the console when you click the quest.

Protip: Use notepad++ for programming, it will make everything easier.

item.title: Why does my new quest bring up player owned shops[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“angle2000555, post:5, topic:549419”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=668322.msg4469675#msg4469675 date=1422295813]
In your click buttons class add System.out.println(buttonId); if it doesn’t print out button’s clicked in the console yet.
Then search for the button id that it printed out in the console inside the click buttons class.
The code that is handled when clicking the button will be there, comment out what is opening the shops.
[/quote]

not to sound retarted but where do i put System.out.println(buttonId); at in clickingbuttons?[/quote]
Right below something similar to this: int buttonId = stream.getWord();

void something(#) {
  int buttonId = stream.readDWord();
  System.out.println("button: " + buttonId);
}
